rules.fullName: Opportunity - Email - Close Date within 5 days
rules.description: Notifies Opportunity Owner when Close Date is within 5 days if Opportunity is still open
Alert to Implementations when a new plan sale closes and the Opportunity is transferred
When a single(k) client terminate or TOK terminates a client due to unpaid invoices send out the necessary e-mail to account to shut the billing down.

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Set LS%2C LDS%2C MOFC for Zen Auto Sale
rules.description: Sets LS (Lead Source), LSD (Lead Source Detail) and MOFC ( Method of First Contact) to Benefit Broker, Zenefits and Partner Sale
Will set the First Bill Date to the next 1st or 15th of the Month
Sets Close Date to "Today + 90" when Lead is converted to Opportunity

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Update - Closed Lost Day check
rules.description: Make's sure Closed Lost Date is not greater than today
Make Singlek the opportunity owner when a Starter(k) or Saver(k) plan is sold.
If Single(k) Service option is left blank populate it

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Update - Stage %3D No Contact Option
rules.description: Set Stage to default to (I) Proposal with No Contact Option if DefaultStagefromLeadDoNotCallCustom field is checked on opportunity.

tasks.description: This plan has stalled in the buy process. Please reach out a help them to complete the purchase.
